title: Replicate
description: Schema for submitting an experimental replicate.

antibody.title: Antibody
antibody.description: For Immunoprecipitation assays, the antibody used.

biological_replicate_number.title: Biological replicate
biological_replicate_number.description: Data collection under the same methods using a different biological source, measuring the variability in the biological source.

technical_replicate_number.title: Technical replicate
technical_replicate_number.description: Data collection under the same methods using the same biological source, measuring the variability in the method.

experiment.title: Experiment
experiment.description: The experiment the replicate belongs to.

library.title: Library
library.description: The nucleic acid library used in this replicate.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: The measurement device used to collect data.

flowcell_details.title: Flowcells
flowcell_details.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the flowcells used for the sequencing of the replicate.

machine.title: Machine Name
machine.description: The lab specific name of the machine used.

paired_ended.title: Paired-end sequencing
paired_ended.description: The utilization of sequencing both ends of the DNA fragment in a library.

read_length.title: Read length
read_length.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the number of contiguous nucleotides determined by sequencing.
read_length.comment: When submitting read length, must submit value for read length units.

RBNS_protein_concentration.title: RBNS protein concentration
RBNS_protein_concentration.description: For use only with RNA Bind-n-Seq replicates to indicate the protein concentration.
RBNS_protein_concentration.comment: Only for use with RBNS replicates.

RBNS_protein_concentration_units.title: RBNS protein concentration units
RBNS_protein_concentration_units.comment: The unit for the dependant RBNS_protein_concentration.
